contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.c8051f970dk.kit.si8051.c8051f970dk.demo.f97x_pca0_frequency_output
contentItem.label: PCA0 Frequency Output
contentItem.description:
PCA Frequency Output Example

This example project uses the PCA's Frequency Output Mode to generate
a 50KHz square wave on P0.2.

The user can connect an oscilloscope or logic analyzer to pin P0.2
to view the generated waveform and/or to pin P0.1 to view SYSCLK.
